name: Referee Titles
description: To remind everyone that the referee is also a player, they can get a different title and playful power every session.
results:
Title: Boss Cat
Session Powers: All must acclaim the local house cat. Give extra xp for cat-themed treats.

Title: The Cleaner
Session Powers: Award xp to players who help clean up after the session.

Title: Electric Ghost
Session Powers: Summon a hero’s annoying ancestor ghost for advice or moral lessons.

Title: Glitch Golem
Session Powers: Move a random location on the map. Swap place names.

Title: Judging Muse
Session Powers: Give xp for good background music choices. Veto bad ones by group vote.

Title: Nine Lifer
Session Powers: Grant up to nine extra life points to characters.

Title: Prismatic Priest
Session Powers: Randomly recolor locations.
Roll d6:
(1) monochrome,
(2) desaturated,
(3) cool hues,
(4) warm hues,
(5) bright, harmonious colors,
(6) a brutal riot of neon and day-glo.

Title: Rail Plotter
Session Powers: Draw a visible path linking prepared locations. Players can choose to follow or ignore it.

Title: Sky Bringer
Session Powers: Create dramatic weather effects in-game. No complaints about tired clichés allowed.

Title: Snack Warden
Session Powers: Give 1d4 re-rolls to players who bring food or music.
